entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Terrace Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:49 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.0°C

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
